name: Vr Boating - Oculus Quest Rowing Machine
name_original: Vr Boating - Oculus Quest Rowing Machine
description:
Strap a controller to a rowing machine and get exercising in style! Go through a procedural world in a virtual boat, while rowing away IRL building up strength and improving fitness! If you don't have a rowing machine, don't worry, you can still do the actions and enjoy the beautiful low poly scenery!

This was a tough jam so things might be a little broken... Only had like 2 days so good luck and happy rowing!

You only need to attach 1 controller if you are using a rowing machine as shown bellow: 

PC build is for oculus users only
